title: Nissan's Saikawa says he wants to 'pass the baton' as soon as possible: Nikkei
text:
Nissan's Saikawa says he wants to 'pass the baton' as soon as possible: Nikkei

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Sep 08, 2019 08:01PM ET)

TOKYO (Reuters) - Nissan (T: ) Chief Executive Hiroto Saikawa said he wanted to "pass the baton" to the next generation as soon as possible, the newspaper reported on Monday, as speculation mounted he could announce his resignation from the troubled automaker. Saikawa made the comment to reporters early on Monday, the Nikkei said. The business daily late on Sunday said he had already told some executives he plans to resign.

Nissan's Saikawa says he wants to 'pass the baton' as soon as possible: Nikkei
description: Nissan's Saikawa says he wants to 'pass the baton' as soon as possible: Nikkei
